name: Jupitron Game Collection Vol.4 - Middleware
description:
Cover art by Goly Andrade!

Just another compilation of games, from around my second year making games (list, gifs & videos coming soon!).

Includes 18 games:

- Recasquares
- Eyebleed hypnosis
- Psylove 2600
- Genkido
- Recoil
- Deathbutton
- Reverse
- Poca's Night Golf
- Survival of the Undead
- Windows Ninja
- Left&Right
- Advent**beep**
- Stev**beep**
- Benny n' Lynne
- Salvation Y2K
- Vatnou
- aRCANE
- Fireskulls

I've shared really incredible moments, on events, in place and online game jams (looking at you Ludum dare) so hope you can enjoy as I've enjoyed each moment I've spent making every one of this games (there's part of some of the most talented people I've meet in some of these games).

Almost each of this games is avalaible on Newgrounds as well but there's a sense of collectible with downloading stuff that recalls the Napster era with a 56k modem (and has some bonus games & stuff as well).

Thank you all for playing, hope you enjoy.
